description.narrative: The development objective of the Project is to increase access to electricity in rural areas of Peru on an efficient and sustainable basis. It would build on the achievements of the First RE Project but would operate in more challenging conditions, providing electricity service in localities that are increasingly distant from the grid and with more dispersed populations.

condition.narrative: Finance Agreement :Schedule 2 Section I A.1(e) | Description :The Borrower shall maintain the Project Directory Committee |Frequency :Yearly
Finance Agreement :Schedule 2 Section I.A.1 (a) and (b) | Description :The Borrower shall maintain the Project Unit with adequatestaff | Frequency :Monthly

Finance Agreement :Schedule 2 Sections I.A.1 (c) and I.D.1 and 2 | Description :The Borrower shall ensure that the Project Unit andRural Electrification Provider applythe Environmental and SocialManagement Frameworks | Frequency :Yearly
Finance Agreement :Schedule 2, Section V. A. | Description :The Borrower shall furnish the contract appointing for aperiod of upto three years the independent auditors | Frequency :Yearly
